titles.title: Blow The Trumpet In Zion, Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blow the trumpet in Zion, Zion.
Sound the alarm in my holy mountain.
Blow the trumpet in Zion, Zion.
Sound the alarm.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
They rush on the city; they run on the wall.
Great is the army that carries out His word.
They rush on the city; they run on the wall.
Great is the army that carries out His word.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Lord utters His voice, before His army.
The Lord utters His voice, before His army.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Que resuenen en Sión trompetas.
Suene alarma en el monte santo.
Que resuenen en Sión trompetas.
Suenen en Sión.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Arrasan los muros; toman la ciudad,
Grandiosas tropas llevando Su voz.
Arrasan los muros; toman la ciudad,
Grandiosas tropas llevando Su voz.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Dios alza Su voz ante Su ejército.
Dios alza Su voz ante Su ejército.
